SEARCH
Package gw.pl.external.entity

Interface Entity

All Known Subinterfaces:
KeyableEntity
@Deprecated public interface Entity
Deprecated.
External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

  • Method Details

    • getFieldValue

      Object getFieldValue(String field)
      Deprecated.
      Get the value of the named bean field, which can be a simple data field, foreign key field, array field or extension field.
      Parameters:
      field - the name of the field to get, case insensitive
      Returns:
      the value of the field
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given field name is not the name of a field on this bean

    • setFieldValue

      void setFieldValue(String field, Object value)
      Deprecated.
      Set the value of the named bean field, which can be a simple data field, foreign key field or extension field.
      Parameters:
      field - the name of the field to set, case insensitive
      value - the new value of the field
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given field name is not the name of a field on this bean, or is the name of an array field

    • isChanged

      boolean isChanged()
      Deprecated.
      Returns:
      True if any fields on the bean have been changed from their original value, otherwise false (even if an event has been added)f

    • isFieldChanged

      boolean isFieldChanged(String field)
      Deprecated.
      Parameters:
      field - Field to check if changed
      Returns:
      True if the field exist on the bean and it has been changed; false otherwise

    • isArrayElementChanged

      boolean isArrayElementChanged(String array)
      Deprecated.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check if any of its current elements have changed
      Returns:
      True if any field on any of the arrays current elements has changed

    • getChangedArrayElements

      Entity[] getChangedArrayElements(String array)
      Deprecated.
      Return the set of changed elements within an array. This method will not return elements that have been added or removed.
      Parameters:
      array - Array for which to get changed elements
      Returns:
      Set of changed elements

    • isArrayElementAddedOrRemoved

      boolean isArrayElementAddedOrRemoved(String array)
      Deprecated.
      Check if an element in an array has been added or removed.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check for additions and removals
      Returns:
      True if an element has been added or removed

    • getRemovedArrayElements

      Entity[] getRemovedArrayElements(String array)
      Deprecated.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check for removed elements
      Returns:
      Elements that have been removed from this array, or an empty array if no elements have been removed

    • getAddedArrayElements

      Entity[] getAddedArrayElements(String array)
      Deprecated.
      Parameters:
      array - Array to check for added elements
      Returns:
      Elements that have been added to this array, or an empty array if no elements have been added

    • getOriginalValue

      Object getOriginalValue(String field)
      Deprecated.
      Returns the orignal value of a field if it has changed, otherwise returns the current value. This method will not work for virtual foreign keys.

      Parameters:
      field - Field for which to get original value
      Returns:
      If field has been changed then the original value is returned; if the field hasn't been changed then the current value is returned; if the field doesn't exist on the bean, or is a virtual field, NULL is returned

    • getOriginalVersion

      Entity getOriginalVersion()
      Deprecated.
      Given a bean with changes, returns a clone of the bean in a new bundle with all of its original values. Join arrays are reset along with normal fields. Virtual array fields are not reset.
      Returns:
      Cloned bean in new bundle with original values

    • getChangedFields

      Set getChangedFields()
      Deprecated.
      Gets the set of changed fields on this bean.
      Returns:
      a set of Strings.

    • getDisplayName

      String getDisplayName()
      Deprecated.
      Returns the display name of the particular Entity instance. If the bean type doesn't have a special display name method registered for it then this is equivalent to calling Entity.toString()
      Returns:
      Display name of the particular Entity instance

    • copy

      Entity copy()
      Deprecated.
      Makes a copy of the bean into the bean's bundle, with all owned arrays copied by default.
      Returns:
      A copy of the bean

    • shallowCopy

      Entity shallowCopy()
      Deprecated.
      Makes a copy of the bean into the bean's bundle. It copies all values from this bean to the copy. It does not copy arrays and just copies the foreign key pointers.
      Returns:
      A copy of the bean
